definitions.definition: To bring into a group, class, set, or total as a (new) part or member.
definitions.example: I will purchase the vacation package if you will include car rental.

definitions.definition: To contain, as parts of a whole; to comprehend.
definitions.example: Does this volume of Shakespeare include his sonnets?

definitions.definition: To use a directive that allows the use of source code from another file.
definitions.example: You have to include the strings library to use this function.

definitions.definition: Such as, among which; introducing one or more parts of the group or topic just mentioned.
definitions.example: All you have to do is to fill in the details, including your name and address and the amount you wish to give.
